Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Tuhanu ki ho'i'a ki tusim ika dusare di madada nahim karade
Sagom aja tam uha agi'akari hana
Ate uha ika duje nu sabodhana karake prasana utara karanage
Kahinage tusim sade kola saje pasi'um a'unde si
Uha utara denage sagom tusim khuda imana li'a'una vale nahi' si
Ate sada tuhade upara ko'i vasa nahim si, sagom tusim hi vidarohi loka si
Isa la'i sade sari'am ute raba di gala puri ho ke rahi. Asim isa da maza cakhana hi hai
Asim' tuhanu bhataka'i'a, asim khuda vi bhatake ho'e si
So uha sare usa dina saza vica ika dusare de sahibhagi honage
Asim aparadhi'am de nala ajiha hi karade ham
Iha uha loka si jadom inham nu kiha janda ki alaha tom`binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim tam iha hakara karade sana
Ate iha kahide sana ki ki asim ika pagala kavi de kahina te apane pujanayogam nu chada de'i'e
Sagom uha saca lai ke a'i'a hai ate iha rasulam di bhavikha bani di pusati hai
Besaka tuhanu daradanaka saza da maza cakhana hovega
Tuhanu use da badala dita ja riha hai, jo tusim karade si
Paratu jihare alaha de cune ho'e bade hana
Unham la'i tai'a kita rizaka hovega
Meve ate uha bahuta izata nala rahinage
Sukhama'i bagam vica
Takhati'am ute ahamane sahamane baithe honage
Unham de kola ajiha pi'ala li'anda javega jihara vagadi ho'i saraba nala bhari'a javega
Sudha paradarasi pina vali'am la'i savada da'ika
Na usa nala ko'i hani hovegi ate na hi budhi bhrisata hovegi
Ate unham de kola nazara nivim rakhana vali'am ate vadi'am akham vali'am auratam honagi'am
Akham i'um' honagi'am samajho, uha ande hana jihare luko ke rakhe hona
Phira uha ika dusare vala sabodhana ho ke gala karanage
Unham vicom ika kahina vala kahega ki mera ika janu si
